alert.note: Alert for Uinta (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 26 at 12:27PM MDT until May 26 at 1:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 100 PM MDT FOR EAST CENTRAL UINTA COUNTY... At 1227 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles east of Mountain View, or 27 miles southwest of Granger, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lyman and Church Buttes. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
